sentence.Network_en: They expected complete exoneration for their clients.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们希望客户们能够完全免责。

sentence.Network_en: Empathy for the criminal's childhood misery does not imply exoneration of the crimes he committed as an adult.
sentence.Network_cn: 对罪犯悲惨的童年表示怜悯不等于可以免除他长大成人后所犯的罪.

sentence.Network_en: Exoneration or rehabilitation should be made known as widely as were the original wrong decisions.
sentence.Network_cn: 原来在什么范围内弄错的,也应该在什么范围内宣布平反.

list.abs: In the end Audi exonerated from any wrong doing , however the damage had been done ., 最终奥迪被免除任何错误做 , 但损害已经完成.
可证明无罪的情况 exonerating circumstances  的相关例句  1. Our circumstances have been rather exceptional.我们的情况相当特别.来自《简明英汉词典》 2. We.
exculpate culpa 罪exonerate onerous 负有法律责任的Jiangang 发表于2006-09-14 08:22:35 | 阅读全文 | | 编辑 |
...罗宾·莱特·潘robin right penn马克·鲁法罗马克 ruffalo地域:美国语言:英语《被证无罪》(the exonerated)中福建省教育厅电话文名称:被证无罪英文名称:the exonerated资源类型:dvdrip刊.

entry.tran: 使免于罪责;证明…无罪;宣布…无罪
entry.def: If a court, report, or person in authority exonerates someone, they officially say or show that that person is not responsible for something wrong or unpleasant that has happened.

example.ex: The official report basically exonerated everyone...
example.tran: 官方报道基本上宣布所有人无罪。

example.ex: An investigation exonerated the school from any blame.
example.tran: 一项调查证明该学校没有任何过失。

means.word_mean: 1. the condition of being relieved from blame or obligation
2. the act of vindicating or defending against criticism or censure etc.;

sentences.sentence: "friends provided a vindication of his position"

auth_sentence.content: The settlement was tantamount to an exoneration.
auth_sentence.res_content: The settlement was tantamount to an exoneration.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The settlement was tantamount to an exoneration.

auth_sentence.content: He comfortably secured more than the one-third of the one hundred votes in the Senate needed for exoneration.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: He comfortably secured more than the one-third of the one hundred votes in the Senate needed for exoneration.

auth_sentence.content: That supposed exoneration of Judas was the most exclaimed-over aspect of the Gospel of Judas.
auth_sentence.res_content: That supposed exoneration of Judas was the most exclaimed-over aspect of the Gospel of Judas.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: That supposed exoneration of Judas was the most exclaimed-over aspect of the Gospel of Judas.
